purpose: Facilitate the development of AI agents with advanced conversational and functional capabilities
principle: Builds on Python with a focus on conversational AI, leveraging function calling and vector search for enhanced user interactions
reusability: Offers a modular framework that can be easily integrated into existing systems via API, supporting extensions through plugins
limitations: Currently in alpha, may have limited stability and feature set; primarily designed for Python environments
name: core
